price: How can you have patience with that which you have no knowledge about?”
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
